headline: Broadridge to Participate in Upcoming Investor Events
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE:BR) announced that it will be participating at five upcoming investor events. Three of these events will include fireside chats with management, which will be available on Broadridge's Investor Relations page at www.broadridge-ir.com.

headline: Transcript : Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. Presents at 53rd Annual JPMorgan Global Technology, Media and Communications Conference, May-14-2025 11
summary: Presenter SpeechPuneet Jain Good morning. My name is Puneet from JPMorgan Payment Processing and IT Services team. Glad to have here with us, Broadridge. We have Tim Gokey, CEO of the company. You
